result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Ayala

records.addlTxt:
11:00 AM Defendant Christopher Ayala in court.  Attorney Xavier Solis in court for Christopher Ayala.  Attorney Alexander Huber in court for State of Wisconsin. Clerk HM.  Offer received, but possible issue with charges.  Atty Solis requests adjmt to discuss with state.  Granted.  Bond continued.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 09:30 am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM. Continued posted n  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Patsy C. C. Krystal H.   The DE may make arrangements with a party or law enforcement to retrieve personal property and/or medication from the victim P.C 's residence within 24 hours of signing the bond in this case.  The DE may not be the party retrieving any property and/or medication.

0216 PM    Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person. Victim: P.C.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Not guilty plea entered by court on behalf of DE. Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 11:00 am. $650   Cash Bond Set w/continued conditions (see bond entry). ec
and witness list filed by the State
